meanings.sent1: My forebears came from a distant land.
meanings.sent2: I am proud of my forebears and their legacy.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, we all dressed up like our forebears!
meanings.sent4: The roots of our family tree run deep with the stories of our forebears.
meanings.sent5: In the old photo album, the faces of my forebears stared back at me.

meanings.definition: A person from whom one is descended.
meanings.sent1: She learned about her forebears in school.
meanings.sent2: My forebears worked hard to provide for their families.
meanings.sent3: When I found out my forebears were pirates, I couldn't believe it!
meanings.sent4: The spirit of my forebears guides me in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The traditions passed down from my forebears shape who I am today.
